attributes.action: Consider having serious trouble making youths at secondary school to be considered for National Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This may help and / or stop the violence that is currently happening in the UK with respect to other people’s lives. 
If this was compulsory then it may even make them think before some of their atrocious actions.
Incidentally if this became a prerequisite, this law may be helping out more than one person in the future.
